translation: As you can，see the autodoc sitting over there is broken. Most of the internals are fine，it's just that the primary arm is in a state of disrepair. Seeing as how auto-docs were precision instruments made before the war，I doubt you or anyone else here could make a new one. A few months ago I found a pre-war shipping manifest detailing a shipment of an autodoc replacement arm to a local hospital. Please go and retrieve it for me.

translation: I'm in need of some assistance with retrieving an item. A few weeks ago，I made a deal with a caravan to acquire some medical precursor chemicals. The shipment still hasn't arrived and is several days overdue. Some local town scouts have determined that the package was captured by some waylaid travellers in an abandoned house in the forest. Retrieve it by any means you wish.

original: Me and my friend over there on the bed are in a bad spot. We were travelling from out west and decided to scavenge for food in a local town. I had a bad feeling about it, but decided against my better judgement to get some tins of old food from a house. Before I knew it, we were ambushed by raiders and my friend over there got a terrible wound. I dragged 'em all the way out to this house in the sticks. I mugged some caravaneer on the way though for any medical supplies they had on them, not like these chemicals do much.
translation: Me and my friend over there on the bed are in a bad spot. We were travelling from out west and decided to scavenge for food in a local town. I had a bad feeling about it，but decided against my better judgement to get some tins of old food from a house. Before I knew it，we were ambushed by raiders and my friend over there got a terrible wound. I dragged 'em all the way out to this house in the sticks. I mugged some caravaneer on the way though for any medical supplies they had on them，not like these chemicals do much.

original: Reverse engineered by the Robco Engineer Robert Mayflower from captured chinese technology, the Stealth Boy Mk.I is a stealth augmentation device that utilizes a complex modulation field to redirect light around its user, rendering the stealth boy operator invisible to all but the most perceptive of enemies. original: Reverse engineered by the Robco Engineer Robert Mayflower from captured chinese technology, the Stealth Boy Mk.II is a stealth augmentation device that utilizes a complex modulation field to redirect light around its user, rendering the stealth boy operator invisible to all but the most perceptive of enemies.
